thread.section_title: Onnit Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Onnit | onnit.com | 2 of 527
thread.title: Samoan Dave

author: Samoan Dave
title: Samoan Dave
text: I was directed to onnit because I'm an avid listener of Joe Rogan's podcast. I ordered a few products that sparked my interest & the immediate results were unmatched. I currently take Alpha Brain, Total Strength + Performance, and Shroom Tech Support. I started on January 16th & I have shaped my body and mind in such a manner that has improved my life all around. I have lost 34 lbs and am still an Supporter and customer of Onnit. Amazing results from a great product.
